body: I love this so much. It makes sense as far as the lore and setting. Bulma lonely after Vegeta's death. Gohan dedicating his life to trying to save humanity from the androids. It's kinda like Kyle Reese and Sarah Conner in the Terminator. They connect as a man and a woman in the most primal way. I love it.

first off, thankyou for this so much i love the take on a different story of DB - plz do Broly Z!!! and second off, i love how unique the last panel always is and that u got slashed by Tapion’s sword here but Bulma was so glad u made the comic 😂
That's a fantastic cover. It's always interesting when an artist can mimic another's style well enough to be convincing and pervs it out. Matured Bulma is tops.
